name: Block Cascade Fusion
description:
Block Cascade Fusion is a very addictive puzzle game which lets you enter compelling worlds full of different falling blocks. You can rotate and move them as you wish, but remember – five in the line is your goal! Once the timer stops, the fusion will start and all converted blocks will be swept away, awarding you with massive amount of points. Score high enough, and you're in for a treat!
